snippet: Charlie Fernandez was shot to death after cooler heads failed to prevail on the Lower East Side.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on the way in which an ongoing personal battle between two knots of young men from roughly the same neighborhood on Manhattan's Lower East Side became a senseless war that took the life of 29-year-old Charles Fernandez.
lead_paragraph: Charlie Fernandez was shot to death after cooler heads failed to prevail on the Lower East Side.

headline.seo: Charles Fernandez Was Casualty of a Turf War on the Lower East Side
headline.main: A War With No Name, but at Least One Battlefield Casualty
headline.print_headline: A War With No Name, but at Least One Battlefield Casualty
